title: sArasa sama mrdu vacana
sahitya:
sArasa sama mrdu vacana mudita sakala sura nikara jaya sarasijanAbha


anupallavi

  mAra janaka kOpAhata para sukumAra vimala sOmOpama su-vadana


caraNam 1    dAna vAraNa sadrshagatE pada pankahaja nata vara dAna lOlupa shubha 
carita bhAnu tanayA taTa vihAraNa bhaya lIla karuNAkara murahara dAnava 
vara ghana kAnana kuladava sUna lasita cikurAnata sukhakara
    caraNam 2    nIla vArida ruciratanO bhujagashana ratha dharaNi bharAntaka mrdu hasita
kAla damanAjanishEvita kAmapAla sahajAtula bhujabala shaila dharaNa su-kapOla
jita kanaka cEla sama bhuvana mUla phaNi shayana
    caraNam 3    kOmaLakayuta niTila vraja vAsikrta sukrta kundarAjita nija radana ramaNIyaka 
nivAsana sama kAmini hrdaya mOhana nirupama bhIma bhava bhavya virAma tanu
vijita kAma sakala guNa sIma hita sujana
